function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Exposure to potentially harmful content during manual tweet extraction","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data collection from twitter may include biased samples and may not represent the entire population’s attitudes towards noise","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Comparison of attitudes towards noise before and during the lockdown may not account for external factors that influence noise perception","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data collection and analysis rely on social media, which may not capture the attitudes of individuals who do not use social media platforms","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreased traffic flow leading to improved air quality and reduced noise levels","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enforced social isolation stimulating digital economy and online education","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fueling of populism and nationalism","category":"Security","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misuse of health information by big tech and governments","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption of disease prevention programs due to focus on covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Economic shutdown leading to small business closures and unemployment","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Existing disease prevention programs disrupted by focus on covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lockdowns prevent people from going to work, leading to prolonged economic impacts and potential worsened living conditions","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid spread of the epidemic through international travel","category":"Transport","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unemployment and economic uncertainty due to the pandemic","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Highly infectious virus transmitted through droplets from infected individuals","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid global spread of the virus resulting in a pandemic","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Origins of the virus in wuhan, an industrialized city in china","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Immediate economic impacts of the virus on international trade, air travel, and employment","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delayed reaction to pandemic threat","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Downplaying the threat of covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on global economy","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Comparison of wastewater surveillance data with clinical data","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low incidence of reported human infections","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High number of active cases contributing to virus circulation","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Retesting for confirmation of results","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate identification of sars-cov-2 genome sequences","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of insight into the presence of sars-cov-2 in wastewater in italy","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Presence of presymptomatic and paucisymptomatic carriers contributing to disease spread","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of efficient control of virus transmission in wastewater","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Wastewater-based epidemiology as a recognized public health surveillance tool","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of people-centered and socially responsible policies","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Supporting local production closer to point of consumption without considering environmental impacts.","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rural-urban migration and pressure on infrastructure","category":"Transport","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of integrated data infrastructure leading to difficulty in data collection and sharing","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data poverty and poor data leading to inadequate response and perpetuating inequality","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate supply chain resilience leading to disruption in essential supplies","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"National considerations and geopolitical interests may prioritize big nations over international collaboration during global crises.","category":"Security","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges being interconnected may require a complex system approach to resilience building.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inclusiveness promotion must be achieved at all levels to enhance resilience and adaptive capacities.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unequal access to vaccines","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differential impact across industries and sectors due to lockdown enforcement","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of organization and coordination leading to the lack of widespread testing and underreporting of cases","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variation in risk communication across states leading to different risk perceptions","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misinformation driven majorly by social media, lack of trust in leadership, and sensationalization of inaccurate news.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Correlation between temperature and interpersonal violence","category":"Security","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global air travel and trade leading to ease of spread of communicable diseases like covid-19","category":"Transport","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate surveillance and slow response to the arrival of the index case in nigeria","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Slow pace of action and failure to ban travel from high-risk countries","category":"Transport","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in cybercrime and spread of disinformation/misinformation","category":"Security","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Urban park use declined during the covid-19 pandemic, leading to more homogenous use by specific demographics.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"}]}
